document_data.name: Nerren's Guardlock
document_data.mainbody: '''Nerren's guardlock''' was a [[combination spell]] attributed to [[Nerren Prentiyuel]]. It combined the effects of ''[[arcane lock]]'' with ''[[magic missile]]''.
document_data.Effects: The ''guardlock'' spell operated as a version of ''[[arcane lock]]'' which unleashed a volley of ''[[magic missile]]s'' into the first unauthorized creature to touch it. However, every time someone failed to dispel it or cancel it with a ''[[knock]]'' or ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell, the spell instead absorbed the magic and stored it as an additional volley of magic missiles.
document_data.Components: The material component for this spell was a spider's web and a strand of the caster's hair.
document_data.History: The spell was attributed to [[Nerren Prentiyuel]].
